title: CSS Reference
description: A beginner-friendly guide to styling and layout with CSS.

content.text: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) controls the appearance of your webpage. It defines colors, spacing, layout, typography, and responsive behaviour.
box-sizing: border-box makes width calculations more intuitive.
Flexbox is ideal for aligning items in one dimension (row or column).
Grid is perfect for two-dimensional layouts.
